subproject.corporate outcome: National, regional and local levels of governance expand their capacities to manage the equitable delivery of public services
subproject.description:
The aim of the project is to support the creation of a system of intergovernmental transfers to ensure larger predictability and equity of available funds for local government units. 
The outputs of the project include:
1) fiscal capacity assessment of municipalities;  
2) detailed assessment of the expenditure needs for local provision of social sector competencies; and 
3) development of a model/formula for allocation of inter-governmental transfers, which should ultimately reduce the gap between urban and in rural communities.
subproject.title: Fiscal Equalization Framework

title: Support to the fiscal decentralization process
